DOC.brief_title: The Application Value STIC Diagnosis Fetal Complex Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This diagnostic test Shanghai Xinhua hospital Nov.2016 Dec.2017 . 265 Cases gravidas fetal congenital heart disease diagnose echocardiography.Only gravidas willing complete pregnancy check finally delivery abortion hospital interview eligible study . Study participant ask informed consent.We collect fetal 2D echocardiography STIC image every 4-6 week pregnancy 1 week baby give birth finish neonatal echocardiography .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gravida singleton pregnancy take fetal echocardiography . 2 . No virus infection drug use history , harmful substance early pregnancy . 3 . Complete pregnancy check hospital , finally delivery abortion hospital . 4 . On basis inform consentï¼Œwilling cooperate group . 1 . Elderly pregnant woman ( > 35 year old ) 2 . Twin multiple pregnancy 3 . Pregnant woman suffer mental illness , ca n't take care . 4 . Fetus diagnose abnormality ( except congenital heart defect )
